text:
The Bludenz District () is an administrative district ("Bezirk") of the state of Vorarlberg, Austria.
It has an area of 1,287.63 km². As of 2012 about 61,407 people lived there.
The administrative center of the district is Bludenz.
Places.
The district has 29 municipalities, one of them is a town, and two of them are market towns.
